name: Glintwraith

special_abilities.name: Memory Siphon
special_abilities.description: The glintwraith can drain the memories of those within 10 feet, reliving the experiences and emotions of others. A creature can resist this effect with a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Nostalgia's Call
special_abilities.description: The glintwraith can summon echoes of the past, conjuring vivid, dreamlike scenarios that transport those nearby to forgotten moments. Creatures within 30 feet must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become entranced for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: Temporal Ripples
special_abilities.description: The glintwraith can manipulate the fabric of time, creating localized distortions that allow it to move through the timestream or summon echoes of past events. The glintwraith can use this ability to teleport up to 30 feet or summon an echo of a past event that lasts for 1 minute.

actions.name: Whispering Winds
actions.description: The glintwraith whispers forgotten knowledge to those within 10 feet, drawing them in with promises of nostalgia and forgotten memories. Creatures within range must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become fascinated for 1 minute.

actions.name: Shimmering Illusion
actions.description: The glintwraith creates a shimmering illusion, making it difficult for enemies to discern reality from fantasy. Creatures within 30 feet have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks for 1 minute.

actions.name: Temporal Flicker
actions.description: The glintwraith flickers in and out of existence, creating a localized distortion in the timestream. The glintwraith gains advantage on all ability checks and attack rolls for 1 minute.

lore: Glintwraiths are born from the collective unconscious of a region, manifesting as shimmering, humanoid figures with bodies composed of shifting, glittering dust. They are drawn to areas where memories have been lost or suppressed, feeding on the residual emotional energy of the past.
